responses: We are located at 123 Main Street
You can find us at 123 Main Street
We are open from 9 AM to 5 PM
Our office is closed on weekends

patterns: What kind of assistance can you provide?
responses: We offer a variety of services including assistance with taxes, permits, and licenses
We are here to help with any government-related services you may need

patterns: What forms do I fill out?
responses: You may need to bring a government-issued ID, proof of residency, and any other relevant documentation
The specific documents required will depend on the services you are seeking

patterns: What payment methods do you accept?
responses: Payments can be made online on irembo
Our website has more information on available payment options
You can reach us by phone at 123-456-7890
More contact information can be found on our website

patterns: Who is eligible for your services?
Am I eligible for your services?
responses: Our services are available to all citizens
Anyone can use our services, as long as they are a citizen

patterns: What is the cost of your services?
How much do I have to pay?
responses: The cost of our services varies depending on what you need
The cost of our services varies, please contact us for more information
